application.name: Hostway IaaS Public Cloud - FlexCloud Servers

presentation.summary: Infrastructure as a service (IaaS) that delivers scalable, pay-as-you-go compute capacity in the cloud. Designed to be one of the most flexible, reliable, and easy to use public clouds on the market. Perfect for deploying servers and resources on demand.
presentation.description:
What sets Hostway’s IaaS Public Cloud apart:
HIGH-AVAILABILITY ▪ Industry-leading SLAs ▪ Complete data persistence with data residing on iSCSI SAN ▪ Protection against hardware failure
RELIABILITY & PERFORMANCE ▪ Redundancy at the host server, storage & network layers ▪ Built for high-speed & performance/low-latency, specifically for IO intensive applications
SCALABILITY ▪ On-demand cloud resource provisioning ▪ Support for vertical & horizontal server scaling
CONTROL & FLEXIBILITY ▪ Easy to use, self-service control panel ▪ Full customization of server configuration ▪ Support for firewalls, load balancers, portable storage volumes
GEOGRAPHIC DIVERSITY ▪ Multiple datacenters across North America
SIMPLE, OPEN API ▪ Based on the OpenStack API ▪ RESTful API for programmatic control of resources & easy integration
FREE INCLUDED SERVICES ▪ Windows Server operating system ▪ 40GB of managed backup ▪ 2000GB of bandwidth traffic
COST EFFECTIVE ▪ Utility-based billing ▪ Support for hourly & monthly pricing
